skills.name: Echo Test
skills.description: Simple echo command for testing SSH connection

skills.name: System Info
skills.description: Display system information (OS, uptime, memory)
skills.command: uname -a && echo '---' && uptime && echo '---' && free -h 2>/dev/null || echo 'Memory info not available'

skills.name: Git Status
skills.description: Show git status with file changes summary
skills.command: cd {{workDir}} && git status && echo '--- Recent Commits ---' && git log --oneline -5

skills.name: Git Diff
skills.description: Show uncommitted changes
skills.command: cd {{workDir}} && git diff --stat && echo '--- Details ---' && git diff

skills.name: Git Commit (Simple)
skills.description: Stage all changes and commit with a message (no AI)

inputs.name: message
inputs.label: Commit Message
inputs.description: The commit message (use conventional commits format)

skills.name: Git Commit (Auto Message)
skills.description: Stage all changes and commit with auto-generated message based on diff
skills.command: cd {{workDir}} && git add -A && git diff --cached --stat | head -20 && echo '---' && git commit -m "$(git diff --cached --stat | head -1 | sed 's/^ *//' | cut -d'|' -f1 | xargs echo 'Update:')"

skills.name: Git Push
skills.description: Push commits to remote repository

inputs.name: remote
inputs.label: Remote
inputs.description: Remote name (default: origin)

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.description: Branch name (leave empty for current branch)

skills.name: Git Log
skills.description: Show recent commit history

inputs.name: count
inputs.label: Number of Commits
inputs.description: How many commits to show

skills.name: Run Tests
skills.description: Execute test-agent test scenarios

inputs.name: scenarios
inputs.label: Scenarios
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of scenario IDs to run (leave empty for all)

inputs.name: concurrency
inputs.label: Concurrency
inputs.description: Number of parallel test workers

skills.name: Diagnose Failures
skills.description: Analyze test failures and generate fix recommendations

skills.name: Run A/B Experiment
skills.description: Execute an A/B testing experiment

inputs.name: experimentId
inputs.label: Experiment ID
inputs.description: The ID of the experiment to run

inputs.name: iterations
inputs.label: Iterations
inputs.description: Number of iterations per variant

skills.name: A/B Experiment Status
skills.description: View status of A/B experiments

inputs.name: experimentId
inputs.label: Experiment ID (optional)
inputs.description: Leave empty to see all experiments

skills.name: List Scenarios
skills.description: List all available test scenarios

skills.name: View Results
skills.description: View test results from previous runs

inputs.name: limit
inputs.label: Limit
inputs.description: Number of results to show

skills.name: Custom Command
skills.description: Run any custom shell command

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.description: The shell command to execute

skills.name: Claude CLI (LLM Service)
skills.description: Run Claude CLI via LLM service - handles stdin properly on Windows

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.label: Prompt
inputs.description: The prompt to send to Claude

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model
inputs.description: Which Claude model to use

skills.name: Claude CLI (Raw)
skills.description: Run Claude CLI directly (may have issues on Windows)

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.label: Prompt
inputs.description: The prompt to send to Claude

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model
inputs.description: Which Claude model to use

skills.name: Claude Analyze File
skills.description: Use Claude to analyze a file in the project
skills.command: cd {{workDir}} && claude --print --model {{model}} -p "Analyze this file and explain what it does: $(cat {{filePath}})"

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.description: Relative path to the file to analyze

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model
inputs.description: Which Claude model to use

skills.name: Run Claude Skill File (API)
skills.description: Execute a Claude skill from a .MD file using the LLM Provider (uses API credits)

inputs.name: skillFilePath
inputs.label: Skill File
inputs.description: Path to the .MD skill file (relative to project root)

inputs.name: userPrompt
inputs.label: User Prompt
inputs.placeholder: What would you like me to do?
inputs.description: Your request/instruction for the skill

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Model
inputs.description: Which Claude model to use

skills.name: Run Claude Skill File (PTY)
skills.description: Execute a Claude skill from a .MD file using PTY (uses subscription auth)

inputs.name: skillFilePath
inputs.label: Skill File
inputs.description: Path to the .MD skill file (relative to project root)

inputs.name: userPrompt
inputs.label: User Prompt
inputs.placeholder: What would you like me to do?
inputs.description: Your request/instruction for the skill

skills.name: Run Claude Plugin (PTY)
skills.description: Execute a Claude Code plugin in interactive mode using PTY (uses subscription auth)

inputs.name: plugin
inputs.label: Plugin Command
inputs.description: The plugin command to run (e.g., /commit, /reflect, /ralph-loop)

skills.name: Run Claude Plugin (API)
skills.description: Execute a Claude Code plugin in non-interactive mode (uses API credits)

inputs.name: plugin
inputs.label: Plugin Command
inputs.description: The plugin command to run (e.g., /commit, /reflect, /ralph-loop)

skills.name: Total Call Trace
skills.description: Comprehensive Langfuse session analysis - traces all tool calls, investigates slot metadata, detects failure patterns (FP-001 through FP-006), and suggests solutions

inputs.name: sessionId
inputs.label: Langfuse Session ID
inputs.description: The Langfuse session ID to analyze (from Ortho-Test-JL-UAT project)

skills.name: Total Session Trace
skills.description: Full tool call dump with execution times, cache decisions, and timing summary per tool

skills.name: Quick Session Debug
skills.description: Fast session diagnostics - checks tool calls, errors, and basic failure patterns

skills.name: Analyze Session
skills.description: Session analysis with tool call extraction and comparison against known patterns

skills.name: Trace Session
skills.description: Trace all Langfuse observations for a session with chronological tool call log

skills.name: Analyze Failure Patterns
skills.description: Deep-dive failure pattern analysis across recent test runs

skills.name: Analyze Sibling Failures
skills.description: Analyze sibling booking failures - multi-child scheduling race conditions and token issues

skills.name: Full Session Analysis
skills.description: Complete session analysis including all observations, LLM interactions, and tool calls

skills.name: Analyze Recent Failures
skills.description: Scan recent test runs for failures and categorize by error type

skills.name: Analyze Trace
skills.description: Analyze a specific Langfuse trace by trace ID

skills.name: Chord Call Lookup
skills.description: Search for a Chord DSO call by any ID (trace ID, session ID, phone number, GUID). Returns formatted session ID, booking details, and call summary.

inputs.name: searchId
inputs.label: Search ID
inputs.placeholder: e.g. +12132791621 or trace UUID or session ID
inputs.description: Any identifier: phone number, trace ID, session ID, appointment ID, GUID

inputs.name: days
inputs.label: Days Back
inputs.description: How many days back to search

inputs.name: allConfigs
inputs.label: Search All Configs
inputs.description: Search all Langfuse configs (not just Chord)

skills.name: Chord UUI Lookup
skills.description: Extract the pipe-delimited UUI (User-to-User Information) string from a Chord session. Accepts either a session ID (conv_*) or a search ID (UUID/trace ID). Returns parsed UUI segments, available variables, location GUID, DNIS, and call summary.

inputs.name: sessionId
inputs.label: Session ID or Search ID
inputs.description: Session ID (conv_X_+phone_timestamp) or search ID (UUID/trace ID) â€” auto-detected
